title: Constant 400 Ping & No Loss Forgiven
body:
Joined a ranked game and sat at 400 ping. Tried to reconnect, nothing changed. Sat in lane trying to awkwardly farm and decided to reset my router because my ping wouldn't budge. Nothing changed after router reset, ended up losing the game and getting the Defeat instead of loss prevented.
(I normally sit at around 70-80 ping on average.)

replies.body: Same thing happened with me, I struggled to even get back in, but when I did I could barely move. Eventually my team lost (even the other team had a DC that never joined) and I was forced to sign a leave buster along with losing LP.
I was a victim of the 400 ping couldnt reconnect to a ranked game no loss forgiven as well.
Same here, 400+ ping and constant disconnects. Game unplayable, can't even recconect half the time. However, I ran a trace route, and it came back perfectly normal. Never seen this before. Thoughts?
I'm having the same issue all of the sudden.  400+ ping, can't hardly move or do anything.  Other games work fine.

I had the same issue. I couldn't even log back into the game. I sat at 400+ ping every time I tried to attempt to log back into the game sitting in the load window. It's been 40 minutes now.. the game is probably lost and I am probably reported because they think I bailed. Not to mention, this never happens... and it takes a long time to even load from the client for some reason. After sitting in the loading screen it tells me to check my internet, and then gives me a link? It's not me.
This is the exact problem i keep getting. I keep getting this message. http://imgur.com/D4CqMx5    If anybody can help so i can get back to playing it would be much appreciated.

I came here seeking help and it seems like in definatly not alone. I been having connection issues ever since this last patch, I've even received a leaverbuster buster penalty for a game I didn't even leave. I have to wait 20 minutes before i play the next 5 games for something that isn't even my fault! This is definatly outrageous.

It happens to me today off and on. I can still see everyone else moving, and most of the time i can still run around but my moves won't go off and then i'll see the attempting to reconnect box. The ping went as high as 2600 at one point. I have never really had any ping problems until today.
Same issues here. Brighthouse Networks, Saint Petersburg, FL. Replicated on multiple machines and hardwired to cable modem.

Had the same thing happen to me, Though it was in a normals bc I'm not 30 yet. It started to happen at about the end of one of my games, thank god I had already helped my adc get kills so we won, after the game I reconnected my router couldn't find anything. I thought maybe it was that I was running something that was killing my process' I stopped anything that looked like it could interfere, didn't help. I play 1 game after to see if it worked bc my computer was running fine nothing else had problems like this. I then sit there with 5-10 second delay as a jg, with an idiot on my team just calling everyone having shit internet(the ahri on my team was having the same issue). lets just say we ff :/
I am on Bright House in Tampa and am having the exact same problem. This has been ongoing for ~1 week.

My ping went back to normal on my third game. I hope all of you get your ping issue fixed soon. I'll probably run into it again. It just went down in game and was like.. "Oh? my ping went down sweet!" It's probably just the NA Server like someone suggested.
Same issue here, 400 constant ping and champion models freezing for 3-10 seconds. And yea no loss forgiven...
Someone at Riot needs to comment so we know that they're working on it. A loss forgiven would be much appreciated as well...
Same as the others above.  400+ ping, got the Leaver warning whenever I finally -did- get to login the damn game.  Super irritated.

Same thing happened to me, tried turning off firewall, resetting my router nothing worked. I then changed to my Latin America North account and I had no lag on it. I think this is exclusively an NA issue, I still get no lag on my Latin American North account but cant even play on my NA account and got a warning because I couldn't play at 400 ping.
Attempting another game. I am loading now still at 400+ ping. 437 to be precise. This sucks. My ping usually only sits at 100/110 and it works fine with no issues.
I had the same thing, the rest of my team and enemy team were fine however. maybe an isp issue? I have fios in texas
http://www.speedtest.net/my-result/4457996952 cc,tx
I am just wishing they would address the issue . 500 ping and unable to move bites . I can log into any other game service zero issues . I am going to play Hero's of the Storm  Riot fix this
me 2. fios tx
No loss forgiven OP
Exactly. Check out all the post here and we all feel ya buddy.
I'm a little livid at the no loss forgiven.
